summary.para: Determines if the active context can accept an embedded object.

param.name: pguidService
param.para: A GUID that identifies the service associated with the object. This value can be NULL if pFormatEtc is valid.

param.name: pFormatEtc
param.para: Pointer to a structure that contains data about the object to be embedded. This value can be NULL if pguidService is valid.

param.name: pfInsertable
param.para: Pointer to a Boolean value that receives the query result. This value receives a nonzero value if the object can be embedded, or zero otherwise.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfQueryEmbedded interface is implemented by the TSF manager and used by a text service to determine if a context can accept an embedded object.

remarks.para: To obtain an instance of this interface, call the ITfContext.QueryInterface method with IID_ITfQueryEmbedded.
